UK House Price Lookup

A tool to check house price statistics for small areas in England and Wales

About this tool

UK House Price Lookup

About this tool

UK House Price Lookup is a tool for users to check house price statistics for small areas in England and Wales. The datasets are provided by the Office for National Statistics API.

About the developer

Hi! I'm Ling W, a passionate front-end developer based out of Birmingham, UK.

I strive to design and build modern, interactive websites that provide engaging and memorable user experiences.

Description: Summary statistics for housing transactions by local authority in England and Wales, on an annual basis, updated quarterly using HM Land Registry Price Paid Data.
